metadata.Author: Adam Conn
metadata.Readme:
=========================================================== Sample Demandbase Connector for xDB Ingestion Manager ===========================================================
----------------------------------------------------------- Prerequisites ----------------------------------------------------------- The following modules must be installed before this package is installed: * xDB Contact Utilities 1.1 (or greater) * xDB Ingestion Manager * Demandbase Connector for xDB Integration Manager
----------------------------------------------------------- About this package ----------------------------------------------------------- This package installs the Sitecore definition items that represent a sample configuration of the Demandbase Connector for xDB Integration Manager.
----------------------------------------------------------- Configuration instructions ----------------------------------------------------------- After the package is installed you must specify your Demandbase API key.
1. Select /sitecore/system/Modules/xDB Ingestion Manager/Data Readers/Sample Demandbase Data Reader 2. For the "Demandbase API key" field enter your Demandbase API key 3. Publish site

Entries.x-item: /master/sitecore/system/Modules/xDB Ingestion Manager/Pull Data Handlers/Test Demandbase Pull Data Handler/{EC0EFF76-7166-4DCD-8942-D799DBD156CC}/invariant/0
